_header: Saint Jerome telleth in his book of fifteen tokening
Note: Part of the concluding section of 4196 occuring separately; precedes 5278; cf. 6345.
_description: The Fifteen Signs of Doomsday — twenty-two lines

BodLauMis622.First Lines:
SEint Ieremie telleþ in his book of xv tokenyngþat god
                    wil aȝeins domesdai here on erþe bring…
BodLauMis622.Last Lines:
…Ich bid hym þat vs deme schal kyng of all kyngeAmong his
                    blissed sones our soules to heuen brynge
BodLauMis622.Editions:
Furnivall,  Frederick James,
                        ed.  
             Adam Davy’s 5 Dreams about Edward II, etc. from Bodleian Laud
                Misc. 622.
EETS
         o.s. 69 (1878; repr. 1973): 92-6.

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Ierome telles in his boke of xv tokenysÞat our lord wole
                    aȝeyn domesday here on erþe bringe…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…I pray god þat vs deme shal þat of all kynges is
                    kyngÞat amonge his blessed sones to reste our soules he bryng.
                    Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Ieremye in his book telleþ of v. tokenyngeThat our lorde
                    or domysday wil on erþe bringe…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…I prey to god þat vs shal deme kyng of all
                    kyngesÞat among his blessed sones þat day he vs bringe.
                    Amen.
